titleStmt.title: The late proceedings and votes of the Parliament of Scotland contained in an address delivered to the King / signed by the plurality of the members thereof, stated and vindicated.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: The difference between F746 and F747 is that on the t.p. of F747 the word "Parliament" is spelled "Parliamemt".
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library and Harvard University Library.
